In England, in the seven days to 18 May, there were 11,996 new confirmed cases (21.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 May, there were 12,314 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (318 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 May is 3,895,920 (6,921.5 cases per 100,000 population).
